name: getHOME open beta
description:
Open beta is 9.99 dollar. The full version will be 4.99 dollar.This game is 3D FPS platformer. The game starts as a giant blue portal teleport  you to an island. In the island you find  a strange building made of random objects. Your task is to get on the top of the building and go through a green portal to get home.

The game made in unity in Low-poly style. The graphics are impressive. 2 level of the 10 is available right now but in every update there will be more.

Every second level is time run and the others are big and difficult levels with no time limit.
